Segment.name: CUR
Segment.comment: To specify the currency (dollars, pounds, francs, etc.) used in a transaction

Field.name: EntityIdentifierCode1
Field.comment: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Field.name: CurrencyCode1
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

Field.name: ExchangeRate
Field.comment: Value to be used as a multiplier conversion factor to convert monetary value from one currency to another

Field.name: EntityIdentifierCode2
Field.comment: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Field.name: CurrencyCode2
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

Field.name: CurrencyMarketExchangeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the market upon which the currency exchange rate is based

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier1
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Time1
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)
